Description: Wooden male figure with a shaven head; inlaid eyes; the right arm is lost; shendyt kilt covered in a layer of gilded plaster; modern legs.
Curator's comments: Published: PM viii, p. 357. N. Strudwick, The Legacy of Lord Carnarvon, Wyoming 2001, p. 29 [24].
Condition: incomplete - right arm lost; legs modern
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
